channel.title: Posts on Data Simplified
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Data Simplified

item.title: Fuzzy Joins and Multiprocessing
item.description: We examine how to join two tables when the columns contain non-matching text by using string distances.

item.title: Scaling and Unscaling Data
item.description: In this post, we examine how to scale data when training an ML model and then unscaling the same data to its original values for easier interpretation.
